member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Access_type
member.summary: The access type granted with this toke. It can be offline or online.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Audience
member.summary: Who is the intended audience for this token. In general the same as issued_to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Email
member.summary: The email address of the user. Present only if the email scope is present in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Expires_in
member.summary: The expiry time of the token, as number of seconds left until expiry.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Issued_to
member.summary: To whom was the token issued to. In general the same as audience.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Scope
member.summary: The space separated list of scopes granted to this token.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Verified_email
member.summary: Boolean flag which is true if the email address is verified. Present only if the email scope is present in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.TokeninfoRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.TokeninfoRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.TokeninfoRequest.QuotaUser
member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.
